mapper.select: select study_group_comment_number, member_nickname, study_group_comment_date, study_group_comment_content, c.member_number, study_group_number from tbl_member m join tbl_study_group_comment c on study_group_number = #{studyGroupNumber} and m.member_number = c.member_number
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_study_group_comment (study_group_comment_content, study_group_comment_date, member_number, study_group_number) values(#{studyGroupCommentContent}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{memberNumber} ,#{studyGroupNumber})
